In spite of the fact that in this town the Motorhomes are not welcome. They still confuse the issue of parking and camping ... Anyway ... I've been using it for years.

title_short: (03130) Santa Pola - Avenue Vincente de Blasco Ibanez
description: It is a residential area, many streets, many parking lots, you can spend the night, nearby services, but be very careful, gypsies, and motorhomes bother them a lot if they are more than 2 days, there is a national law but according to the city council they are above that instruction and there is a real dictatorship when it comes to parking and staying overnight.

title: (03130) Santa Pola - 9 Carretera Elche-Santa Pola

title: (03130) Santa Pola - 54 Calle Zamora
description: Large deserted gravel area along the stadium. Near the Mac Donalds. Just arrived we had the visit of the local police (23:30) for a control. Friendly welcome, informing us that we can rest safe because we are behind their police station.

title: (03130) Santa Pola - 6 Calle Lérida
description: Laundrette inside a Carrefour. Ideal for washing whilst shopping. Car park has spaces for larger vehicles on the upper level.

description: Camping "bahia" in Santa Pola Bay, located next to the natural area of Las Salinas, where you can see a large number of birds.

title: (03130) Santa Pola - 30 Avenida Zaragoza
description: Parking of the Theme Park "Pola Park" parking area without limitation of size, spoken with park staff, parking and overnight stays are allowed for motorhomes. Very quiet area, but at the end of the parking lot there is a national road with a lot of traffic, it is better to spend the night near the local road.

description: Discounts for 1, 3, 6 and 12 months.

Gas refill. The Polagas have their own adapter for Finnish side loaded gas bottles. The gas station staff refilled two of our Finnish gas bottles.
Fill all bottles except Spanish ones.
GPL mixture is 80% propane, 20% butane.

description: Spent the night here, no disturbances, . very nice.

title: (03130) Santa Pola - 4 Camino del cabo
description: Here you are right next to the sea. The road is not busy. WARNING! A few meters further, an area begins where overnight stays with motorhomes are expressly prohibited (with signage). Here, he is apparently still allowed.

title: (03130) Santa Pola - Faro del Cabo de Santa Pola
title_short: (03130) Santa Pola - Faro del Cabo de Santa Pola
description: Place in the countryside close to Miradors del Far, Cape Santa Pola. Many different places and flat to land along the path to the lighthouse (Faro del Cabo de Santa Pola). No services on site, and very little network (edge) at the end of the road because of the radar antennas. No height / width limit.

address.street: Faro del Cabo de Santa Pola

title: (03130) Santa Pola - 22 Partida Bancal de la Arena
title_short: (03130) Santa Pola - 22 Partida Bancal de la Arena
description: Large parking in front of the beach behind the road. To spend the night seems to be legal, several police cars are passed, it is tolerated to be here. The whole side of the road towards the sea seems to be closed and therefore impossible to stay at night. Plants and trees are installed on the old car parks. The police pass frequently. This place is nothing special but you are alone, 100 m from the sea and on the "mountains" behind you, a lighthouse protects the coast.

title: (03130) Santa Pola - 23 Avinguda Catalanet
description: Small car park between 2 others. Right on the beach with the mountain backdrop. No services but fairly calm. Forbidden to stay at night

title: (03130) Santa Pola - 23 Camino del cabo
description: Nice place with views of Tabarca Island. Small sandy beach. There are no signs prohibiting the parking of motorhomes

title: (03130) el Gran Alacant - 19 Avenida de Finlandia
title_short: (03130) el Gran Alacant - 19 Avenida de Finlandia
description: Miele Self-Service Laundry. Miele Washers and Dryers. Detergents and softeners Included. Located in the Gran Alacant Shopping Center. (In front of the Parking).

name: Camper Oase Puravida
title: (03139) Camper Oase Puravida
description: Camper Oase Puravida offers space for 3 campers with spacious pitches and a beautiful view in a green valley. Cross Cami de Luna. Nice sanitary facilities. Petanque ground available. A nice place to stay. The area offers excellent opportunities for hiking and cycling. Supermarket available. The baker arrives. Health Pola and beach 6 km. Elche and Alicante can be visited within a good distance by bike, public transport or car. Please call or email ahead, limited seating.

title: (03130) Santa Pola - Camino del cabo
description: Location next to a small beach and rock to be able to fish. There are other places all along this road but there really good. We just spent 2 quiet nights there. A little walker and people on the beach but at this time the top. The Guardia Civile came by several times and said nothing. Just above behind you, there is a viewpoint to see (20min by car) super beautiful landscape, on the 3rd photo seen from the mirardor, the spot is to the left of the photo after the trees, 4th photo the viewpoint

title: (03130) Santa Pola - 71 Carrer de Creta
description: Large car park right next to a Repsol.  50 meters to a large and beautiful dog park.  Clean.  150 meters to shops and pharmacies and more.  You can possibly spend the night here.

title: (03130) Santa Pola - 37 Camino del cabo
description: Parking in front of beach for dogs.

title: (03130) Gran Alacant - Cam. del Carabasi
description: Farther than the referenced spot. It is possible to park along the road with a motorhome or a van, but the terrain is very bumpy. Sea view no beach but it is possible to swim between the rocks. Passage of the police several times but without telling us anything. Pitch for camping car and van all along the road. Can be prohibited in high season.

title: () Gran Alacant - Cam. del cabo
description: Very good place to spend a few days out of season

title: (03130) Santa Pola - Camino del Carabasí
description: Day parking only. Night parking on the coast is prohibited; the police monitor and verbalize.

title: (03139) Valverde - 2050 Partida Valverde Bajo
description: Place to park and spend the night, has a supermarket next door and near a bus stop that takes you to the beaches. It is the parking lot of the supermarket and the owners allow you to spend the night, a good place to spend the night if you are on the way to somewhere

title: (03195) Santa Pola - Camino del cabo
description: Two very large, unpaved and somewhat bumpy car parks. There is a small road but with little traffic (practically nothing at night). In the top parking lot there is a decent telephone signal (4G), in the one near the sea it is poor (3G). The advice is to park so that everyone has space. Unfortunately, there are always bullies who get on the side and occupy three seats. Then of course they expose everything, awning, chairs, ... do this and then it will end like in Portugal. 5 km away there is the possibility of loading and unloading (regularly) for only 5 Euros.

title: (03130) Alicante - 27 Partida Balsares
description: Had parked in the parking lot because the one ahead was full to walk to the beach. Parking lot and surroundings full of garbage!! Beach is nudist and not very nice. Although beach in the water itself large stones and many algae-like round soft parts. We had the dog with a prohibition sign we didn't see it. There are also no shady places totally overcrowded at the weekend. No real recommendation unfortunately...

title: (03195) Elx - Camino del cabo
description: Quiet location stayed here overnight right close to sand Junes  it says there are restrictions for camping police swing by and didn’t bother us during the winter months

name: Finca La Signatura
title: (03139) Finca La Signatura
description: Finca La Signatura. A little paradise for holidaymakers with 3 spacious, bushed areas for motorhomes or caravans. Beautiful large swimming pool, trampoline and a bowling alley. Nice and clean sanitary facilities. Anne and Nick make you feel welcome on this beautiful and peaceful finca nestled between the plantations. There is also a holiday home and guest room. Overall a lovely place to stay. The area is flat so excellent for cycling, 6 km from the beach and 7 km from the palm city of Elche. Shops in the immediate vicinity. Due to the limited number of places, calling/Whatsapp in advance is recommended.

title: (03139) Barri Alt - 1032A Partida Valverde Alto
description:
Small-scale camper place for max 5 campers.
Beautifully situated between Santa Pola and Elche, both places are 7 km away and easily accessible by bike.
Supermarket and restaurants less than 2km.
Please call in advance for availability.
Not suitable for children under 12 years!
NB! Water and empty waste water tank or toilet only for guests! Minimum stay 2 nights!

title: (03195) Los Arenales del Sol - 62 Avenida San Bartolome Tir
title_short: (03195) Los Arenales del Sol - 62 Avenida San Bartolome Tir
description: Public source.

title_short: (03195) Los Arenales del Sol - 26 Calle Zamora
description: Good area to stay overnight, as an alternative to Calabassi beach, when the police tell you that you cannot stay overnight on the beach. He has a couple of traps at the end of the street to empty gray water.

title: () La Marina del Pinet -
description: Caravaning la marina es una Camper Área ubicada a tan solo 1km de la playa del pinet, ofrece los servicios de vaciado y llenado de aguas grises, vaciado de aguas negras, duchas de agua caliente, wifi, servicio de lavandería de pago, zona de fregaderos…

title_short: (03195) Los Arenales del Sol - 44A Avenida San Bartolomé de Tirajana
description: Public source

description: Parking on the beach of the pinet. For the day, many people but the beach is very good. There is a restaurant next door where you eat very well. For the day only

title: (03194) Camper Park El Pinet Playa
description: "Playa del Pinet CAMPARK" - La Marina - Elche (Alicante) motorhome area, 1km from the beach and the nearest shops. Installation with toilets, showers, wifi, closed awning prohibited.

name: Parking Cris Aupa

Parking, barbecue area 24h and loading / unloading area just with booking!!!
Please write us a WhatsApp (We do not answer calls 24 hours a day)

title: (03194) Elx - Camí del RuÏssos

title: (03194) Elx - 36 Avinguda de l'Alegría
description: Quiet zone. You cannot park on Thursdays due to the market. Parking in very long cordon. If you arrive until 8:00 p.m. you have plenty of parking. In the adjacent areas you have a bakery, ice cream parlor, two bars, and a small park area for children. It is perfect to spend one or two nights. Of course, the beach is 700 meters away on foot.

title: (03194) Elx - 9025 Lugar Marina Urbanizable
description: Flat terrain behind the sports hall, with dirt floors, bushes and trees. Ample for a few ACs / campers. It is a discreet and very quiet place where you can spend the night for free near the natural park of Las Salinas. You can park earlier on the road or follow the stony path and turn to the right to go more unnoticed. Sometimes those who go to the sports center park here. Container nearby.

title: (03195) Elche - 223 Carretera Saladar
description: Parking on dirt, well leveled. A 5 minute walk to get to the beach. A little noisy due to the proximity of the airport. However, at night it is quite quiet. Near the village of El Altet (supermarket, laundry, patisseries, ...)

title: (03195) El Altet - Avinguda Dama d'Elx, 32
description: Drinking water fountain

title: (03195) Elx - 5 Carrer Galeote
description: Laundry room with dryers. Great prices and very clean.

title: (03195) Elx - 20A Carrer Terral
description:
Large unpaved but level parking area between apartments.
quite a lot of noise from the airport next door

title: (03194) La Marina - Unnamed Road
description: Good way to stop here for one night.

title: (03195) L'Altet - 78a Carrer Pintor Sorolla
description: It is fine for the water load, but there is no unloading of gray or black ones.

title: (03294) Santa Fé - 3073B Partida Hoya
description:
***Please note, minimum stay is 72 hours***
Small, private camper place of Dutch/Swiss owners with 5 places. Beautiful pitch between the palm trees with a beautiful large swimming pool. There is also a casita that one can rent. Closed area so very safe. 5 km from the El Pinet beach, 3 km to the town of la Hoya with bakery, supermarket and restaurants, 13 km to the famous palm park of Elche and 25 km from Alicante.
Because there are only 5 places, it is advisable to call or send a whatsapp first. They speak Dutch, English, (Swiss) German and French

title: (03140) Guardamar del Segura - 17 Calle Costa Bella
title_short: (03140) Guardamar del Segura - 17 Calle Costa Bella
description: Beach car park without any amenities. Sea is 500m away, cafe and excellent restaurant (Rivingtons) over the road. Gravel surface and only small light overnight from campsite next door.

name: Camping La Marina
title: (03194) Camping La Marina
description: Top place. Recommended by ADAC. 450 pitches for mobile homes, tents and caravans. Additionally 50 bungalows +10 luxury villas. All services available: bars, restaurants, supermarket, laundry service. In the high season with animation program and huge water park. A 3000 m² wellness facility, which is also open in winter. (Additional chargeable). The price includes WiFi and electricity (10A). Water tap available on site. About 700 m to the beach. Very nice path through the dune landscape and pine forests. Also good to ride a bike. The beach has received the blue European flag for quality. The pitches come in different sizes. All pitches are shaded in summer. Multilingual reception. Very nice vegetation on the square. The pitches are separated from each other with plants. This place leaves nothing to be desired.

title: (03194) Guardamar del Segura - 11 Urbanización Costa Bella-la Marina
title_short: (03194) Guardamar del Segura - 11 Urbanización Costa Bella-la Marina
description: Parking near the campsite in front of the bar and restaurant 10 minutes from the beach

name: ACAEP Caravanas y Autocaravanas
title: (03294) ACAEP Caravanas y Autocaravanas
description: Reception area between individuals in Partida Daimes polygon 3 number 221-D to spend the night with a caravan or motorhome. Quiet place where you can spend one or more nights, 3km from the town of La Hoya where there is everything you need, restaurants, financial institutions, supermarkets and a gas station. There is a bus stop both to go up to Elche and to go down to the beaches of La Marina which are about 4 km away and where you can also visit natural bird spots. We are on the road from Elche-Elx to the Marina at km-8 on the right going down from Elche-Elx. Sign up with Carlos via WhatsApp.

name: Casa La Marina
title: (03194) Casa La Marina
description:
A small campsite with swimming pool, restrooms, laundry and other recreational facilities. Minimum 3 days stay. Swedish and English speaking staff. Non smoking campsite!
welcome.

title: (03140) Guardamar del Segura - 1 Partida el Saladar
title_short: (03140) Guardamar del Segura - 1 Partida el Saladar
description:
It is a parking lot that is past the eucalyptus path, about 10 vans fit on the level part direct access to the beach and the dunes of Guardamar, quiet. There are fishermen coming and going throughout the night, and pumpstation goes on sometimes (quite noisy if you wake up easily). 
Accessible from the north side of the river.

title: (03320) Torre del Pla - 31 Carrer Aeroport
description: Wide and well leveled field on the outskirts of Torrellano. It is very close to the airport and it is noisy although at night from 0:30 to 6:30 there is no air traffic. Scandal bakery 3 min walk.

title: (03177) San Fulgencio - C. Mar Cantabrico, 17
description: Washing machine, dryer all very clean.

title: (03320) Torre del Pla - 31 Carrer del Llimó
title_short: (03320) Torre del Pla - 31 Carrer del Llimó
description: Parking for the night - level ground on gravel - no services - 80 m from some restorations/ bar. Ideal for those who need to pick up or drop someone off at the AirPort.

title: (03008) Urbanova - 2 Carretera Saladar
description: The beach two meters from the vehicle, the sea thirty meters away, ideal for dog owners. Very busy place. Restaurant is easily accessible on foot. Unfortunately, the place is on a busy road and in the flight path. From 10:30 p.m. to 4:00 a.m. little noise, but then the rush hour starts. Don't forget earplugs!

title: (03177) San Fulgencio - Calle Mar Cantabrico
description: Argentino; Services and parking area, 10 m square with wifi, full of water, electrical connection 6A, bathroom with hot shower, free wifi, beach at 1500 m, supermarket at 150 m

title: (03320) Torre del Pla - 16 Avinguda de Illice
title_short: (03320) Torre del Pla - 16 Avinguda de Illice

title: (03140) San Fulgencio - 1 Plaça Poligono 13

title: (03177) Ciudad Quesada - 4 Calle Mar Jonico
description: Parking spaces between unbuilt land and a cultivation area near a quiet commercial area at night when the shops close, we slept well and safely because the guardia makes patrols but does not tell us anything

title: (03320) Torre del Pla - s/n Ctra. Alicante-Elche
title_short: (03320) Torre del Pla - s/n Ctra. Alicante-Elche
description: Parking 4 min (2.5 km) from the airport. Next to restaurant almendros. Ideal for picking up someone at the airport. In that case, take a bus parking at the airport

title: (03320) Torre del Pla - 31 Carrer de la Pau
title_short: (03320) Torre del Pla - 31 Carrer de la Pau
description: Simple dirt parking. Next to downtown for groceries and laundromat 2 blocks away. Very good Turkish kebab not far away. To check if there are not market days. We spent the weekend there with no worries.

title: (03140) Guardamar del Segura - 17 Carrer Basilio Paredes
title_short: (03140) Guardamar del Segura - 17 Carrer Basilio Paredes
description: Medium-sized gravel yard near the marina. Very calm to sleep. Also for large vehicles.

title: (03320) Torrellano - 2027 Partida Torrellano Alto
description: Caravan & Camper Parking. Overnight acceptance & airport transfer included in price. Nice garden & bbq area available.

name: Alannia Guardamar
title: (03140) Alannia Guardamar
description: Camping Marjal 5 *. Great luxury very clean, cheap with the ACSI card out of season. Not far from the beach (5 minutes). Not far from Guardamar (30 minutes). Pool heated in winter.

title: (03008) Alacant - Agua Amarga Playa
description: This beach was great for parking for a few days, she used it regularly to stay at night, but she was woken up at 8:00 a.m. by the civilian from Gaurda who banned camping at night, so now they've moved us, what pity! Prohibited for vehicles over 5 m long

title: (03140) Guardamar del Segura - 145 Calle Ingeniero Codorníu
title_short: (03140) Guardamar del Segura - 145 Calle Ingeniero Codorníu
description: Parking place

title: (03293) Daimés -
description: We are located between Elche and La Foia, fully enclosed private land near the Alcudia archaeological site. 3 pitches maximum for more comfort and tranquility. 6A electricity, water drain filling, Wi-Fi, tennis court, pétanque track, cycle path nearby, bicycle and tandem, helmet and life jacket available, start of the Rio Vinalopo discovery hike, library, swimming pool. a moment of relaxation with jacuzzi and sauna

title: (03290) Elche - 14 Carretera Alicante-Murcia

title: (03203) Elx - 2 Carrer Morera
description: A fairly large car park. I would say more for vans than motorhomes (they go more unnoticed.  (4G Vodafone 2/4, Movistar 3/4)

title_short: (03202) Elx - 10 Carrer José Antonio Cañete Juárez

title: (03140) Guardamar del Segura - 26 Calle Madrid
description: Large online parking area on a side street next to the gas station. Slightly sloping. You can park day and night, a lot of traffic, but a bright place. We have stayed here without problems. There is a laundry at the gas station. They have LPG and AdBlue. Nearby there are shops and the town center is one km away.

name: Cementerio Torrellano

description: Parking at the cemetery. You can hear the highway. Ideally located near Alicante airport.

title: (03203) Elx - 21A Carrer Escultor Capuz

title: (03203) Elche - 2 Calle de le Corbusier
description: Good place to park and visit the city of Elche. Very close to Caravanas Cruz.

title: (03203) Elche - 4A Avenida de Santa Pola
description: Excellent and vast site to visit the palm grove. Between school and civil guard!

title: (03290) Elche - CV-8500
description: Repsol gas station with the option of filling up with water.

title: (03202) Elche - Avinguda de la Universitat d'Elx
title_short: (03202) Elche - Avinguda de la Universitat d'Elx
description: Parking in a quiet area, near sports area and supermarkets. with some shade depending on the time of day

title: (03008) Alacant - 3 Calle Bélgica
description: Parking, normally quiet, near the N-332, there are two hotels, near the city of light, at night without problem. No service just parking.

title: (03140) Guardamar del Segura - 47 Avenida de la Llibertat
title_short: (03140) Guardamar del Segura - 47 Avenida de la Llibertat
description: There are a series of parking bays along the front allowing for vans to pull in overnight. Flat easy access to the beach but no dogs on the beach. I was however visited by the police this morning and they’ve given me a warning that only one night is allowed for free camping in the township.

title: (03204) Elche - 6 Travesía Manuel López Qu 1iz
description: Place in clay, not flat. Suitable for vans. No service. Exposed to the sun, with little shade.

title: (03202) Elche - 7 Camino de Castilla
description: Newly created municipal car park. It is paved and with marked squares. Very close to the University and the center of Elche where you can visit tourist places. It is accessed by Jose Sanchez Saez street

title: (03140) Guardamar del Segura - 1 Carrer Era de Madaleneta
title_short: (03140) Guardamar del Segura - 1 Carrer Era de Madaleneta
description: Public parking, no problem for night shopping, cheap restaurants.

name: Platja La Roqueta
title: (03140) Platja La Roqueta
description: Day and night parking. Right on the wide, fine sandy beach. There are very few car-sized pitches. The rest is for wheelchair users or mopeds. With a length of 6.30 m, the narrow pavement is already behind you. So nothing for longer vehicles, just about suitable for vans and only a maximum of 2 or 3. Many locals go to the beach here.

title: (03202) Elche - 4 Avenida del Alcalde Vicente Quiles
title_short: (03202) Elche - 4 Avenida del Alcalde Vicente Quiles

title_short: (03202) Elche - 1 Avinguda de la Universitat d'Elx
description: Fairly safe place to park, day and night. very quiet. Near university.

description: Safe place to visit the city and parks.

title: (03202) Elx - 5 Carrer Nuestra Señora de la Cabeza
title_short: (03202) Elx - 5 Carrer Nuestra Señora de la Cabeza
description: Parking with a large capacity, very close to the center. On Friday and Saturday nights, they drink. You can find gorillas or concerts. It is usually a safe place. Without service but about 300 m from the municipal park where there are fountains and toilets. Also next to the downtown pools. Next to the tourist office. Interesting to do the Ili Palmir route especially if you are traveling with children.

address.street: 5 Carrer Nuestra Señora de la Cabeza

title: (03202) Elx - 10 Passeig de l'Estació
description: It is the parking lot of the train station .. perfect for visiting the municipal palm grove .. once you enter, you go to the cafeteria and get the ticket .. the first hour is free!

title: (03293) Elx - 18 Avenida Alcalde Ramon Pastor
description: 2 km from the city center. Lots of free space. I slept one night with no problem.

title: (03008) Alicante - Avinguda d`Elx
description: Nice place for one or two nights , next main road is sea for swimming and fishing and many more , peacefull place from 20 hours till to morning , cause is it close from beautiful park la Palmeral , recommended

title: (03293) Elche - 225 CV-875
description: Point close to two primary schools so the vehicle will be monitored during the week due to the influx of people in the area.

title: (03008) Alacant - Avenida de Elche

It has a fountain next to it to catch water, a park for children, a pee can, a shopping center, a gas station, a beautiful walk and is very central to visit everything on foot. It has trees that provide shade. There is very close a vegan restaurant and supermarkets and bars. The only two drawbacks? There is traffic noise as is normal in the city and on Thursdays there is a market.

title: (03008) Alacant - 22 Carrer Ramon Gómez Sempere

title: (03140) - 91 Partida Moncayo

Open Wash laundromat.

Credit card paiement is currently not working and the machine says "No Cambio" so bring your small bills and coins.
The place is clean and there is a easy parking nearby.

It has an exchange machine. Around there is a hairdresser, a couple of bars and a supermarket about 4 minutes walk. There are no bathrooms inside.

title_short: (03008) Alicante - 57 Avinguda de Alcalde Lorenzo Carbonell

description: Parking of Leroy Merlin and Mac Donalds. No parking problems. Nothing else to do.

In front of the parking there is a local park where there is a source of water and a toilets.

description: Lavenderia / washing machines. Coin changer machine.

By cons must not be too long 5.5 maxi nor too wide 2m maximum. Convenient to visit the castle of Santa Barbara. the access lift is 100 m. Otherwise for small volumes parking along the beach next door. And underground parking port 2 m high max.

title: (03001) Alicante (Alacant) - 49 Avenida Alfonso El Sabio
description: Parking Alfonso X - Good and safe place to park your car during the day in Alicante. Perfect for a short trip and not too far from the castle (~20min). Max. 2.2m height. Not too expensive.

name: La Fabrica Dolores Art Living Events
title: (03150) La Fabrica Dolores Art Living Events
title_short: (03150) La Fabrica Dolores Art Living Events
description:
Welcome to Jonathan & Michael – the now legendary campground exclusively for adults aged 14 and above, starting from October 2023. We've gained cult status and international recognition for our innovations and warm hospitality. Fluent in 8 languages, we offer countless cultural and recreational activities, regular events, and valuable tips for your stay. Just minutes away from breathtaking beaches, dunes, and pine forests, with shopping and dining options within walking distance. Easy to find on Google Maps with Park4Night. Want to extend your stay? We'd love to have you!

Dogs:
Attention: No Off-Leash Dogs Allowed & Only Quiet Dogs Allowed
-----
Prices:
Vehicle and trailer length less than 8 meters
1 night: €14
1 month: €350
Plus €2 for total length over 8 meters (night)
------
Service inclusive:
- 2 adults and 1 pet
- Gray and black water
- Fill up with water
- WIFI Fiber optic internet (high speed)
- WC & showers (hot water)
- Fitness / Gym
------
Service exklusiv:
- Electricity 3 € (6 Ampere) or 0.50/kwh
- Washing 5 €
- Additional adults €4
- Additional animals €1
----
Car rental:
1 Day / 25 €
----
Professional help and translation service
(Repairs, notary, doctor, lawyers, real estate, etc. fluent in the following languages:
Spanish / German / English / Dutch / French /
€ 15 per hour

Guided tours, climbing, hikes etc. with Jonathan.
Price depends on the number of people

name: Finca Familia
title: (03113) Finca Familia
description: Finca Familia is run by a Dutch family who have made their dream come true. Thanks to the friendly atmosphere, small scale, hospitality and personal attention, you will soon feel like family. Your pets are also welcome with us. It is a mini campsite located in a quiet area with a beautiful view of the cities of Alicante and Elche. Both towns, the beach and the airport are 15-20 minutes away by car. Alenda Golf is a 5 minute drive away. We offer: showers, toilets, sinks, washing up area, WiFi, pétanque court, spacious pitches, large swimming pool with free deckchairs, possibility to empty the toilet cassette, water and a cozy common room with darts. For an additional fee, we offer a shopping service, electricity, laundry, transfers to the desired places, dog sitting service.Visit our facebook page minicampingfincafamilia or contact us without obligation. Do you want to come and visit us? Of course we like it ;-) Because navigation sometimes requires our guests to drive on impassable roads, we strongly advise you to contact us beforehand. We can then provide you with the correct route so that you arrive without problems. We look forward to welcoming you to our Finca, Sincerely, Finca Familia ☀.

title: (03205) Elx - 1285 Partida Carrus
description: Picnic area of Elche, area where you can rest and go to see the river or the vicinity of the Elche reservoir. Good area for bikes and hiking. On weekends if people tend to go. It does not have water or electricity.

title: (03149) Guardamar del Segura - 42 Plaça SUP-8
description: Urbanizacion not built quiet calm ideal for resting accessible to any size of camper van 1 km 5 from the Sunday lemon market in Guadarmar

title: (03002) Alicante (Alacant) - 25 Calle de la Virgen del Socorro
title_short: (03002) Alicante (Alacant) - 25 Calle de la Virgen del Socorro
description: Parking space suitable for small vans (we were there with a VW California T6), we made two laps to find a suitable parking space. Were "supported" by a Spaniard who understood himself as a "parking attendant". Got us a suitable parking spot and assured us we could spend the night there. There are also no prohibition signs, parking is chargeable from 8 a.m. to 6 p.m.

address.street: 25 Calle de la Virgen del Socorro

title: (03004) Alicante (Alacant) - 8 Calle Poeta Quintana
description: Washing machine no bank card banknotes change or coins. washed well, simple but clean place. easy parking on Sunday, however difficult during the week as it is close to the central Alicante market.

title: (03150) Dolores - 40 Sector 3
description: Very quiet for the night, in the garden museum, visit the city of Dolores, very beautiful place of the church.

title: (03005) Alicante (Alacant) - 2B Calle Juanito Santero
description: Convenient place for overnight stay, downhill or uphill depending on how you want to park, little passage is very safe.

description: Self-service laundry! Opel wash

title: (03005) Alacant - 1 Castillo San Fernando
description: Right next to the Castell de Sant ferran is a small carpark under some trees. Perfect to explore the city. We parked our t4 here overnight as there are no signs that forbid overnight parking. Spaces are big enough for smaller vans although they are on a bit of a slope. No cameras anywhere and very quiet so we’re not sure how safe the place is.

title: (03158) Catral - 74B Camino lo Chicharra
description: Quiet, small-scale camping spot near the El Fondo nature reserve. 2.5 km from the village of Catral. Swimming pool available. Bikes for rent in the village. Cozy restaurants, open all year round. 6 seats.

title: (03005) Alicante (Alacant) - 4 Calle Hondón de los Frailes
title_short: (03005) Alicante (Alacant) - 4 Calle Hondón de los Frailes
description: Nice little car park beside a running track and police station. perfect for staying the night or parking up before going into the city.

title: (03005) Alacant - 21 Avenida Doctor Rico
description: Parking without service at fifteen minutes walk from the Center of the city of Alicante, near Mercadona supermarket and Castell restaurant

title: (03005) Alicante (Alacant) - 9 Calle Isla de Corfú
description: Great place to spend the night, in a very quiet and bright neighborhood street. A lot of parking at night. For the most complicated day because it is next to two schools. 5 minutes from the exit of the highway.

title: (03016) Alicante - 2 Avenida Villajoyosa
description: This is basic parking. Some marked spaces for standard vehicles, nothing designated for vans. However it is also possible to park anywhere along the roadside as it is not metered. Spaces can be limited at busy times. There are no real facilities apart from a bin, but if you just need a short stopover, you could do worse. Lastly, there is a hight restriction set at 2.6 metres. This however is for the lowest side if the bridge. I am about 2.9 and got under without a scrape. Just stay as far left as possible.

title: (03009) Alacant - Calle Escultor Bañuls
description: Free parking opened all day long.  Close to the football stadium and a sport area where there is a source of water.  There is also a toilet but is opened only during the day.  In front of the parking there is a skate park and a local park.

title: (03016) Alicante (Alacant) - 7 Avenida de Villajoyosa
description: Parking near the center, does not have services, but the center is not far.

title: (03012) Alicante (Alacant) - 36 Avinguda de Jijona
description: Parking lot next to the ADDA (music hall). No services and plenty of space on a Sunday. Would not overnight as the neighborhood looks a bit rough

title: (03178) Benijófar - Escalera Huertos
description: Picnic area, BBQ area. There are many tables. We stayed for lunch during the day. The road can be heard, immediately after that we drove on. The parking lot is big enough to turn around.

title: (03178) Benijófar - 2A Calle Aneto
description: Parking behind/next to the MacDonalds. Restaurants, bars and shops within walking distance. Nicely landscaped park for walking and playground for children. Suitable for larger motorhomes or combinations

title: (03188) La Mata - 5 Calle del Puerto Romano
title_short: (03188) La Mata - 5 Calle del Puerto Romano
description: Close to shops and restaurants. Access to parking is limited on market day (Wednesday morning).

title: (03005) Alicante -
description: Large esplanade of public parking where on Thursdays and Saturdays they install the flea market for what is forbidden those mornings. We spent two quiet nights and little night traffic.

title: (03009) Alicante (Alacant) - 18 Calle Aureliano Ibarra
description: Parking surely to be avoided. we went in broad daylight to the nearby market for an hour. On our return we were robbed of an old classic bicycle with a child seat in the back as well as the saddle of a 2nd bicycle. So be vigilant

title: (03016) Alacant - 28 Paseo de Gomiz
description: Free parking in front of a small beach. 15 minutes from downtown Alicante. Calm.

name: AREA 15 Formentera
title: (03179) AREA 15 Formentera
description: Motorhome area in the urban center. It has 15 plots of 8 meters long and 4.30 meters wide, with electricity service and tap, gray and black water emptying area, Wi-Fi, barbecue... the area is fenced and the site is guarded. by security camera system. At 50 meters there is a supermarket and bars. Emptying and filling water service en route: €5 (free overnight) There is a municipal swimming pool 500m away during the summer season.

title: (03013) Alicante (Alacant) - 29 Calle Dato Iradier
description: Baquedano Laundry Self-service laundry with also home delivery (in our case caravan / camper). You call the phone that appears in the photo or on Google Maps, they pick up your clothes and they return them clean.

title: (03016) Alacant - Calle del Obispo Victorio Oliver Domingo
title_short: (03016) Alacant - Calle del Obispo Victorio Oliver Domingo

title: (03150) - 182A Diseminado Cebadas

title: (03158) Crevillent - 1A Partida San Felipe Neri

Large car park without amenities, next to a natural park. Large campsite nearby.

Overnight stays are no longer allowed since March 7, 2023, the park authorities have introduced new rules here.

title: (03158) Catral - 12A Camino de lo Chicharra
description: Agricultural farm with production of vegetables and fruits that can be purchased very fresh from the field. Hof has a small parking lot where you can park mobile homes or campers. Small flock of sheep, goats, chicken coop, geese. In addition to a barbecue area and tables, there are also toilets and showers, as well as sinks with hot water. Fresh water supply possible. The host speaks Spanish and English.

title: (03178) Benijófar - 1 Lugar Diseminados
description: Great place for a night on the outskirts of Benijar. Quiet area, you are on a street with hardly any traffic, and you can walk to the nice center of Benijar. Recycle bins only, no other services.

title: (03184) Torrevieja - N-332
description: Pebble parking at the entrance to La Mata National Park. Beautiful walks to do. 500m from the beach. Bike paths around.

title: (03016) Alicante - 584 Avenida de Villajoyosa
description: Nice view and convenient location. For easy access without stress and scratches, just read the comments or see the picture which outlines a possible access.

title: (03013) Alicante (Alacant) - 8 Camino de las Cigarreras

description: Free parking day and night. Quiet and well-lit area with a tram stop for getting to the city center or near beaches and shopping centers. Restaurants, cafes, supermarket 100 meters away, unsupervised. A good option to visit the center and the castle of Alicante and spend the night. 20 min from the beach by walking. Let’s be respectful and civic with the environment and don’t allow neighbors and authorities to worry.

title_short: (03016) Alicante - Calle Madre Teresa de Calcuta
